pkgmetadata.longdescription: DMR Detection by Non-Homogeneous Hidden Markov Model from Methylation Array Data // Perform differential analysis for methylation array data. Detect differentially methylated regions (DMRs) from array M-values. The core is a Non- homogeneous Hidden Markov Model for estimating spatial correlation and a novel Constrained Gaussian Mixture Model for modeling the M-value pairs of each individual locus.
